attributes.action: bring forward the end of First Day Marketing of residential property to the 1st of April 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many 1000s' of people have remortgaged their homes, took loans and worked very hard to train as a DEA and Home Inspector. 

These hardworking people who wanted to work in a new career for a rewarding wage have been penalised enough by the withdrawal of mandatory HCRs'. There are now more than enough DEAs' to bring forward the end of first day marketing to April 2008 instead of leaving it till the 31st of May 2008. So show your support for these hardworking DEAs and sign today. 

Ceasing first day marketing will not cause any unnecessary delays to homeowners.
